name: ListEventTypeAvailableTimes
description:
Get available times for an event type within a date range.

Use this tool to retrieve available times for a specific event type within a 7-day date range. Ideal for scheduling and planning purposes.

parameters.name: event_type_uri
parameters.description: The URI associated with the specific event type to query available times for.

value_schema.description: The uri associated with the event type

parameters.name: availability_start_time
parameters.description: The start time for the availability request. Ensure the date is not in the past.

value_schema.description: Start time of the requested availability range. Date cannot be in the past.

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: End time of the requested availability range. This date must be later than the start_time and within 7 days.

value_schema.description: End time of the requested availability range. Date must be in the future of start_time.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the calendly API.

parameters.name: event_type
parameters.description: The uri associated with the event type

value_schema.description: The uri associated with the event type

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Start time of the requested availability range. Date cannot be in the past.

value_schema.description: Start time of the requested availability range. Date cannot be in the past.

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: End time of the requested availability range. Date must be in the future of start_time.

value_schema.description: End time of the requested availability range. Date must be in the future of start_time.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
